org.jerkar.api.java
Class JkJavaProcess

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.java.JkJavaProcess

public final class JkJavaProcess
extends java.lang.Object

Offers fluent interface for launching Java processes.

Method Summary

andOptions

Same as andOptions(Collection).

andCommandLine

public JkJavaProcess andCommandLine(java.lang.String commandLine)
Takes the specified command line as is and add it to the process command line. Example of command line is -Xms2G -Xmx2G.

withWorkingDir

public JkJavaProcess withWorkingDir(java.io.File workingDir)
Returns a JkJavaProcess identical to this one but using the specified working dir.

runJarSync

public void runJarSync(java.io.File jar,
                       java.lang.String... arguments)
Runs the specified jar file and wait for termination.

runClassSync

public void runClassSync(java.lang.String mainClassName,
                         java.lang.String... arguments)
Runs the specified class and wait for termination. The class has to be on this classpath.

classpath

public JkClasspath classpath()
Returns the classpth of this JkJavaProcess.
